Weapon.Name: Echoes of Time
Weapon.Description: This ancient staff was once wielded by the first Chronomancer, capable of bending the fabric of time.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Slows enemy movement by 50% for 5 seconds
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As you channel the staff's power, the air thickens and your foes' movements become sluggish.

Weapon.Name: Astral Dagger
Weapon.Description: A blade forged from celestial metal, it phases in and out of reality.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Has a 10% chance to bypass enemy armor
Weapon.NarrativeLine: Your enemy barely sees the blade before it cuts through the air, phasing through their defenses.

Weapon.Name: Orbiting Shield
Weapon.Description: A floating disc that orbits the wielder, crafted from the core of a fallen star.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Reflects 5% of melee damage back to the attacker
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As an enemy strikes, the shield pulses, sending a portion of the force back upon them.
